name: IP_EDU_OT_DATA
description: This table contains generic contact specific data for the title/topic/point.

columns.name: TEACHING_TTP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Teaching Title/Topic/Point record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: The display name of the title/topic/point.

columns.name: PAT_FRIENDLY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the title/topic/point that is used when displayed to a patient.
